review.summary: Simple module initialization file that properly exports the ActionHandler class from the handlers submodule. Follows neo-commons conventions with clean imports and explicit __all__ declaration. Serves as the public API entry point for the handlers module.

positive_observations.observation: Follows neo-commons __init__.py pattern with explicit __all__ declaration for public API control
Clean relative import structure using proper from .submodule import syntax
Minimal and focused - serves single purpose of module initialization
Consistent with actions system architecture patterns for handler organization

context.tests: No tests needed for simple module initialization file
